expo.name: the mole
expo.description:
two player game based on wikipedia articles and network science.
the player goal is to reach his/hers opponent in the shortest and the quickest way possible. 
each player gets a source vertex (starting article) and target vertex (ending article), the game algorithm will advice one 'good' article to continue with and two bad ones until the user get's to his/her's target.
there are six categories to play.
